roleset.name: figure out

example.name: transitive
example.text: Yutaka Kawashima also suggested that the Universe Development Undertaking Group organize an [inspection team]-1 *PRO*-1 to thoroughly ascertain the reason why the satellite could not enter geosynchronous orbit [*T*-15] .
example.arg: the reason why the satellite could not enter geosynchronous orbit

roleset.note: Framed by Neville. VN updated by Julia, 9/2010. Member of Vncls discover-84, ensure-99, promise-37.13.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'ascertain' based on sentences in ECTB.
